Qualys Web Application Security Service

Thank you for signing up for the Web Application Security Service trial to safeguard against Log4Shell attacks! Your Qualys subscription subscription_ID has been provisioned.



Get to know Web Application Security Service


You have taken the right step towards understanding your organization's potential exposure to Log4Shell attack to your websites and internet-facing applications by signing up for this trial.


Use the Qualys Cloud capabilities provisioned in your subscription to start scanning your externally facing web apps for Log4Shell vulnerabilities.


To get started with your Log4Shell detection, watch the short Introductory Video and review the Playbook.
